regen.absent_element: alerting the operator when executing beyond permitted interaction levels
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall alert the operator if any function execution attempt is made beyond the permitted interaction level.

regen.absent_element: alerting the operator when executing functions beyond permitted interaction levels
regen.new_specification: The system shall alert the operator if the operator attempts to execute a function beyond the permitted interaction level.

regen.absent_element: Alerting the operator when execution beyond permitted interaction level is attempted
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall alert the operator if an attempt is made to execute functions beyond the permitted interaction level.

label: The TCS shall inform the operator if the operator attempts to execute a function prohibited as a result of the determined level of interaction.
absence: Warning for execution of functions prohibited according to determined interaction levels
